title: Pimco New York Municipal Income Fund II (PNI) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: Pimco New York Municipal Income Fund II ( PNI  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.04 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 01, 2019. Shareholders who purchased PNI prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 6th quarter that PNI has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $11.84, the dividend yield is 4.05%.
The previous trading day's last sale of PNI was $11.84, representing a -4.44% decrease from the 52 week high of $12.39 and a 14.18% increase over the 52 week low of $10.37.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the PNI Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
